massqc

About

massqc is a R package which is used for untargeted metabolomics data processing and analysis.

Installation

You can install massqc from Github.

# Install `massqc` from GitHub
if(!require(devtools)){
install.packages("devtools")
}
devtools::install_github("tidymass/massqc")

Usage

Please see the Help document page to get the instruction of massqc.

Need help?

If you have any quesitions about massqc, please don’t hesitate to email me (shenxt@stanford.edu).

Citation

If you use massqc in you publication, please cite this publication:

X Shen, ZJ Zhu - Bioinformatics (Oxford, England), 2019, MetFlow: An interactive and integrated workflow for metabolomics data cleaning and differential metabolite discovery.
Web Link.

Thanks very much!
